A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Holy moly. The film does not pick up where the last movie left us.The Resistance blew up Starkiller Base\, the probably most resource-eating project in the history of the universe\, and the First Order emerges from that incident stronger than before? That's just the first of a whole barrage of plot holes that make this by far the least gripping SW movies ever made. The apparent lack of logical thinking in the writing room leaves me dumbfounded.
